channel.title: How do i know my password ?
channel.description: I tried to do some things but the terminal ask for a password . I do not have a password

item.title: How do i know my password ?
item.dc:creator: TNT_BOM_BOM
item.description:
if u r running UI/terminal interface, it will firstly ask u for ur username & password (if u didnt change the password or the username):-

default username:- user
default password:- changeme

and when you type “sudo” something , it will ask u for the password , put the same password:- changeme

as Ego have said , it is mentioned inside the terminal/konsole

Read full topic
item.source: How do i know my password ?

item.title: How do i know my password ?
item.dc:creator: Ego
item.description:
Good day,

It’s “changeme”, it is actually showing up inside the console whenever you use it, together with the warning, that it should be changed. More on this here: https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Post_Install_Advice#Change_Passwords

Have a nice day,

Ego

Read full topic
